page.title: 13CUSTOMS. RHYMES OF WILLEY.
page.content:
The following are rhymes recited by local children. WORDELLS is for industry RIDGES is for stock BORESFOED is for thistles HILL HOUSE is for docks CO OP is for apples WILLEY LODGE for pears TIPTON is for rabbits PANT HALL is for hares. HillHouse no longer exists; hicks Farm, now empty was once run as a co operatve.
Never marry a farmer His pigs are all acry He'll take you to the countryside And work you till you'll die.
This rhyme reflects the present generation of girls determination not to return to the land.
